citethispage-desc: 添加[[Special:CiteThisPage|引用]]特殊页面和工具箱链接
tooltip-citethispage: 关于如何引用本页的信息
citethispage-badrevision: 错误：找不到页面“$1”中任何修订ID为$2的修订版本。
citethispage-content:
__NOTOC__
== {{FULLPAGENAME}}的参考详情 == * 页面名称：{{FULLPAGENAME}} * 作者：{{SITENAME}}贡献者 * 出版者：{{SITENAME}}，{{int:sitesubtitle}}。 * 最后版本日期：{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日 {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * 检索日期：{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日 {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * 永久URL：{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * 页面版本ID：{{REVISIONID}}
== {{FULLPAGENAME}}的引用格式 == === GB7714格式 === {{SITENAME}}编者．{{FULLPAGENAME}}[G/OL]．{{SITENAME}}，{{int:sitesubtitle}}，{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日{{CURRENTTIME}}［{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日{{CURRENTTIME}}］．{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}． === [[APA style|APA格式]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}．（{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日）．''{{SITENAME}}，{{int:sitesubtitle}}''．于{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日{{CURRENTTIME}}查阅自{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}． === [[The MLA style manual|MLA格式]] === “{{FULLPAGENAME}}．”''{{SITENAME}}，{{int:sitesubtitle}}''．{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日{{CURRENTTIME}}（协调世界时）．{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日{{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>． === [[MHRA Style Guide|MHRA格式]] === {{SITENAME}}编者，‘{{FULLPAGENAME}}’，''{{SITENAME}}，{{int:sitesubtitle}}''，{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日{{CURRENTTIME}}（协调世界时），<{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>［于{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日查阅］ === [[The Chicago Manual of Style|芝加哥格式]] === {{SITENAME}}编者，“{{FULLPAGENAME}}，”''{{SITENAME}}，{{int:sitesubtitle}}''，{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}（于{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日查阅）． === [[Council of Science Editors|CBE/CSE格式]] === {{SITENAME}}编者．{{FULLPAGENAME}}［互联网］．{{SITENAME}}，{{int:sitesubtitle}}；{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日{{CURRENTTIME}}（协调世界时）［引用于{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日］．可访问自： {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}． === [[Bluebook|Bluebook格式]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}，{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}（最新访问于{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日）． === [[BibTeX|BibTeX记录]] === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[在线资源；访问于{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日]" } 使用[[LaTeX|LaTeX]]包装的链接（开头某处的\usepackage{url}）将提供更好的网址格式，推荐选用下列格式： @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[在线资源；访问于{{CURRENTYEAR}}年{{CURRENTMONTH}}月{{CURRENTDAY}}日]" }
